message.entry: Sample time is a non-tunable property. You cannot change the sample time value while the model is running.
Invalid sample time. Sample time must be a real scalar value or an array of two real values.
Invalid sample time. Sample time must be non-negative or -1 (for inherited).
Invalid sample time. Sample time offset must be smaller than the sample time period.
Invalid sample time. When the period is -1, offset must be 0.
Invalid sample time. When the period is 0, offset must be 1.
Cannot decrement use count below 0 for {0}.
The context for URI {0} is already registered.
The context for URI {0} is not registered.
The context data must be of type matlabshared.libiio.internal.ContextData.
The libiio installation directory was not found. Try reinstalling the support package.
